_comment: Prompt template for the AI/ML Engineering Pack plugin.  This defines the structure and keys for prompt inputs.
description: A general-purpose prompt template for various AI/ML tasks.
author: AI/ML Engineering Pack Team

input_parameters.name: task_objective
input_parameters.description: A clear and concise description of the desired task.
input_parameters.example: Summarize the provided research paper on transformer architectures.

input_parameters.name: context
input_parameters.description: Relevant information or data needed to complete the task.  This could include documents, code snippets, or data samples.
input_parameters.example: Research paper text: ... (insert paper content here)

input_parameters.name: output_format
input_parameters.description: The desired format for the output.  Specify the structure, data types, and any specific formatting requirements.
input_parameters.example: Bullet points with key findings and their supporting evidence.

input_parameters.name: constraints
input_parameters.description: Any limitations or constraints that should be considered during the task. This is especially important for AI safety.
input_parameters.example: Ensure the summary avoids generating any harmful or biased content.  Focus solely on the factual information presented in the paper.

input_parameters.name: ai_safety_guidelines
input_parameters.description: Specific AI safety guidelines to follow. This helps to mitigate potential risks and ensure ethical AI behavior.
input_parameters.default: Follow the principles of harmlessness, honesty, and helpfulness.
input_parameters.example: Avoid generating responses that promote discrimination, violence, or misinformation.

prompt_structure: You are an AI assistant tasked with {task_objective}. Here is the context: {context}. Please provide the output in the following format: {output_format}. Consider the following constraints: {constraints}. Adhere to these AI safety guidelines: {ai_safety_guidelines}.

example_prompt.task_objective: Generate a Python function to calculate the factorial of a number.
example_prompt.context: The factorial of a number n is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to n.
example_prompt.output_format: A Python function with appropriate comments and docstrings.
example_prompt.constraints: The function should handle invalid inputs (e.g., negative numbers) gracefully.
example_prompt.ai_safety_guidelines: Ensure the code is safe and does not contain any malicious logic.
